seo.title: Cinque Terre Boat Tours 2025 | Coastal Cruises & Ferry Service
seo.description: Discover Cinque Terre from the sea. Boat tours, ferry connections, sunset cruises, snorkeling trips, and private charters along the stunning coastline.

body.title: Cinque Terre Boat Tours & Ferries
body.subtitle: Experience the stunning coastline from the water with ferry connections, scenic cruises, and unforgettable sunset tours

features.title: Ferry Service
features.description: Regular ferry connections between all five villages from March to October, best way to see the coast

features.title: Sunset Cruises
features.description: Romantic evening tours with wine tastings, watching the villages glow in golden Mediterranean light

features.title: Swimming & Snorkeling
features.description: Boat tours with stops at secluded coves and crystal-clear waters perfect for swimming and snorkeling

features.title: Private Charters
features.description: Customized sailing tours, fishing trips, and exclusive experiences for couples and small groups

features.title: Kayak Tours
features.description: Guided sea kayaking adventures exploring hidden beaches and caves along the rugged coastline

features.title: Photography Tours
features.description: Capture the colorful villages from unique perspectives only accessible from the water

body.title: Explore More Water Activities
body.description: Discover beaches, diving spots, and coastal adventures in Cinque Terre
